Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19799950]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus thuringiensis ATCC 1041 (MIC=4 µM), B. subtilis ATCC 9372 (MIC=8 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC=8 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19799950]0.01% hemolytic activity at 100 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: SK84 displays antibacterial activity against the tested Gram-positive bacteria (B. subtilis, Bacillus thuringiensis and Staphylococcus aureus), but had no effect on Gram-negative bacteria (Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli) and fungi (Saccharomyces cerevisiae, Candida albicans). Has weak hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Isolation, characterization and anti-cancer activity of SK84, a novel glycine-rich antimicrobial peptide from Drosophila virilis.
Literature.Author: Lu J, Chen ZW.
